info.name: OIMS API Collection - Core Endpoints
info.description: Focused collection of OIMS API endpoints for Academic Records, Admin, Auth, Branch, Contributor, Events, Fundraiser, Guardian, Inventory, Inventory Transaction, Medical Record, Notification, Orphanage, Orphan, and Volunteer controllers

item.name: Academic Record Endpoints

request.description: Create a new academic record for an orphan
Add an academic subject to an existing academic record
Get academic records for a specific orphan
Get summarized academic records for an orphan (lightweight version with minimal fields)
Get detailed information for a specific academic record including subjects
Update an existing academic record
Update an existing academic subject
Delete an academic record
Delete an academic subject

item.description: API endpoints for managing academic records

item.name: Auth Endpoints

request.description: User login endpoint
Reset password for a user
Change user password
Activate user account

item.description: API endpoints for authentication and authorization

request.description: Get all admin users (super admin only)
Get a specific admin by ID (super admin only)
Create a new admin user (super admin only)
Upload admin profile image (uses authenticated user's profile)
Delete an admin user (super admin only)
Update admin information (super admin only)
Update own admin profile (available to all authenticated users)
Change own password (available to all authenticated users)
Get all branches (Super Admin only)
Get details of a specific branch
Create a new branch (Super Admin only)
Update an existing branch
Delete a branch (Super Admin only)
Get all contributors for a specific fundraising campaign
Add a new contributor to a fundraising campaign (public endpoint)
Get all fundraising campaigns (public endpoint)
Update the status of a fundraising campaign
Get fundraisers for a specific branch
Get details of a specific fundraiser
Get fundraisers for an entire centre (Super Admin only)

body.raw:
{
  "coordinatorName": "John Doe",
  "goal": 5000.0,
  "purpose": "School supplies for orphans",
  "budgetBreakdown": "Books: $2000, Stationery: $1500, Uniforms: $1500",
  "amountPayedPerIndividual": 100.0,
  "orphanageAmountPerIndividual": 80.0,
  "eventName": "Back to School Drive",
  "coordinatorEmail": "john.doe@example.com",
  "fundraisingReason": "Educational Support",
  "phoneNumber": "1234567890",
  "eventStartDate": "2025-06-01",
  "eventEndDate": "2025-06-30",
  "branchPublicId": "string"
}

request.description: Create a new fundraiser (public endpoint)
Upload an image for a fundraiser (public endpoint)

body.raw:
{
  "fundraiserEmail": "john.doe@example.com",
  "fundraiserName": "John Doe",
  "campaignName": "Back to School Drive",
  "campaignPurpose": "Educational Support",
  "adminFeedback": "Thank you for your successful campaign!",
  "amountRaised": 4800.0,
  "goalAmount": 5000.0
}

request.description: Send feedback for a fundraiser (Super Admin only)
Update the status of a fundraiser (Admin only)
Delete a fundraiser (Admin only)
Get all fundraisers across all branches (superadmin only)
Get fundraisers for the current user's branch without providing branch ID
Add a guardian for an orphan
Add a guardian with photo in a single request
Upload a photo for a guardian
Update guardian information
Delete a guardian
Get all inventory items across all branches (Admin only)
Get inventory items for a specific branch
Get inventory items for the current user's branch without providing branch ID
Get a specific inventory item by ID
Add a new inventory item
Update an existing inventory item
Delete an inventory item

item.name: Inventory Transaction Endpoints

request.description: Add a new inventory transaction
Update an existing inventory transaction
Delete an inventory transaction

item.description: API endpoints for inventory transaction management

item.name: Medical Record Endpoints

request.description: Get summarized medical records for an orphan (lightweight version with minimal fields)
Get detailed information for a specific medical record

body.raw:
{
  "diagnosis": "Common cold",
  "treatment": "Rest and medication",
  "description": "Patient presented with fever and cough",
  "doctorName": "Dr. Jane Smith",
  "hospitalName": "City General Hospital",
  "hospitalAddress": "456 Hospital Lane, Anytown",
  "hospitalPhoneNumber": "1234567890",
  "orphanPublicId": "string"
}

request.description: Create a new medical record for an orphan

body.raw:
{
  "medicalRecordPublicId": "string",
  "diagnosis": "Influenza",
  "treatment": "Updated medication and rest for 5 days",
  "description": "Patient symptoms worsened, diagnosed as influenza",
  "doctorName": "Dr. Jane Smith",
  "hospitalName": "City General Hospital",
  "hospitalAddress": "456 Hospital Lane, Anytown",
  "hospitalPhoneNumber": "1234567890",
  "orphanPublicId": "string"
}

request.description: Update an existing medical record
Delete a medical record

item.description: API endpoints for medical record management

item.name: Get Unread Notifications for Current Branch

request.description: Get unread notifications for the current authenticated user's branch (Branch Admin only)

item.name: Get All Notifications for Current Branch

request.description: Get all notifications (both read and unread) for the current authenticated user's branch (Branch Admin only)

item.name: Get Unread Notifications by Branch ID (Explicit)

request.description: Get unread notifications for a specific branch ID (Super Admin only)

item.name: Get All Notifications by Branch ID

request.description: Get all notifications (both read and unread) for a specific branch ID (Super Admin or Branch Admin of the specified branch)

item.name: Get All Unread Notifications Across All Branches

request.description: Get all unread notifications across all branches (Super Admin only)

item.name: Get All Notifications Across All Branches

request.description: Get all notifications across all branches (Super Admin only)
Mark a specific notification as read or unread
Mark all notifications for a branch as read
Delete a specific notification (Super Admin only)
Delete all notifications for a branch

item.name: Orphanage Endpoints

request.description: Get orphanage center information (accessible to all authenticated users)

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Hope Orphanage Centre",
    "location": "Nairobi",
    "address": "123 Charity Road, Westlands",
    "phoneNumber": "1234567890",
    "email": "contact@hopeorphanage.org",
    "description": "A nurturing home for children in need"
}

request.description: Create a new orphanage center (Super Admin only)

body.raw:
{
  "centrePublicId": "string",
  "name": "Hope Orphanage Centre",
  "location": "Nairobi",
  "address": "456 Charity Lane, Westlands",
  "phoneNumber": "0987654321",
  "email": "info@hopeorphanage.org",
  "description": "A nurturing home providing care, education, and support for children in need",
  "superAdminPublicId": "string"
}

request.description: Update an existing orphanage center (Super Admin only)
Delete an orphanage center (Super Admin only)

item.description: API endpoints for orphanage center management

request.description: Get orphans belonging to a specific branch
Get orphans belonging to the current user's branch
Get a specific orphan's details by ID
Get all orphans across all branches (Super Admin only)

body.raw:
{
  "origin": "Mombasa",
  "fullName": "John Doe",
  "dateOfBirth": "2018-05-12",
  "religion": "Christian",
  "adoptionReason": "Lost parents in accident",
  "gender": "Male",
  "bloodGroup": "O+",
  "allergies": ["Peanuts", "Dust"],
  "medicalHistory": "Generally healthy, had chicken pox in 2020",
  "specialNeeds": "None",
  "hobbies": "Drawing, football",
  "educationLevel": "Primary",
  "previousSchoolName": "Sunshine Primary School"
}

request.description: Add a new orphan (Branch Admin only)

formdata.value:
{
  "origin": "Mombasa",
  "fullName": "Jane Doe",
  "dateOfBirth": "2019-03-15",
  "religion": "Christian",
  "adoptionReason": "Abandoned at hospital",
  "gender": "Female",
  "bloodGroup": "A+",
  "allergies": ["None"],
  "medicalHistory": "Generally healthy",
  "specialNeeds": "None",
  "hobbies": "Singing, painting",
  "educationLevel": "Kindergarten",
  "previousSchoolName": "Little Angels Kindergarten"
}

request.description: Add a new orphan with photo in a single request (Branch Admin only)
Upload a photo for an orphan

body.raw:
{
  "orphanPublicId": "string",
  "origin": "Mombasa",
  "fullName": "John Doe",
  "dateOfBirth": "2018-05-12",
  "religion": "Christian",
  "adoptionReason": "Lost parents in accident",
  "gender": "Male",
  "bloodGroup": "O+",
  "allergies": ["Peanuts", "Dust", "Milk"],
  "medicalHistory": "Generally healthy, had chicken pox in 2020, recovered well",
  "specialNeeds": "Mild asthma",
  "hobbies": "Drawing, football, reading",
  "educationLevel": "Primary",
  "previousSchoolName": "Sunshine Primary School"
}

request.description: Update an orphan's information
Delete an orphan
Get volunteers for a specific branch
Get details of a specific volunteer
Get volunteers for an entire centre (Super Admin only)
Register a new volunteer (public endpoint)
Get volunteers for the current user's branch without providing branch ID
Update the status of a volunteer (Admin only)
Delete a volunteer (Admin only)
